trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started"></xref> and <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the workflow runtime engine is running.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 런타임 엔진이 실행 중인지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: IsStarted will be `true` for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName> event and false for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: IsStarted 됩니다 `true` 에 대 한는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트 및 false는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow runtime engine is running; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>워크플로 런타임 엔진이; 실행 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
